mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wf_process_task WHERE process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} ORDER BY create_time ASC

SELECT t.*, i.business_key, i.business_type, d.definition_name as process_definition_name FROM wf_process_task t LEFT JOIN wf_process_instance i ON t.process_instance_id = i.instance_id LEFT JOIN wf_process_definition d ON i.process_definition_id = d.definition_id WHERE t.assignee_user_id = #{assigneeUserId} AND t.task_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.*, i.business_key, i.business_type, d.definition_name as process_definition_name FROM wf_process_task t LEFT JOIN wf_process_instance i ON t.process_instance_id = i.instance_id LEFT JOIN wf_process_definition d ON i.process_definition_id = d.definition_id WHERE i.business_key = #{businessKey} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.*, i.business_key, i.business_type, d.definition_name as process_definition_name FROM wf_process_task t LEFT JOIN wf_process_instance i ON t.process_instance_id = i.instance_id LEFT JOIN wf_process_definition d ON i.process_definition_id = d.definition_id WHERE t.task_status = #{taskStatus} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wf_process_task (process_instance_id, task_key, task_name, assignee_user_id, assignee_user_name, assignee_emp_code, candidate_users, task_status, task_type, priority, due_date, comment, create_time) VALUES (#{processInstanceId}, #{taskKey}, #{taskName}, #{assigneeUserId}, #{assigneeUserName}, #{assigneeEmpCode}, #{candidateUsers}, #{taskStatus}, #{taskType}, #{priority}, #{dueDate}, #{comment}, NOW())
